comments.content:
For an in-depth (and perhaps depressing) look at how Western culture was molded by key people into the debtor/consumer model it is today, torrent the 4-part BBC documentary, "The Century of the Self."

Westernized countries make more sense after seeing the motives of these influential people exposed.

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Century_of_the_Self
http://www.bbc.co.uk/bbcfour/documentaries/features/century_of_the_self_episode_1.shtml
